answers.answer: I have gestation diabetes , im 19yrs and 31 weeks now still not taking medicine for it cus i control it by diet i check my sugar 4 times a day its all good :) & to be honest i still eat w.r i want which i as houldnt cuss it can cause me to have high as ugar and use meds but im perfecyly fine . Baby is perfect size not over weight one bit lol :) be positive girlllll !

I am borderline GD. I still have to prick my finger but I get to emotional if my numbers are a few points over so I stopped, I also felt like I was starving myself with the diet they wanted me on

I am 23 and just got diagnosed with it. I've been testing for 2 days and mine is all good too. Its no big deal unless you're someone who's sugar spikes high it can cause a big baby and for you to be more likely to get real diabetes later in life. Just keep it in check.

question: Anyone else get diagnoses with this recently? Today was my first day of testing my blood sugar levels and they were all good, just wondering if I am alone or not because of how young I am
title: gestational diabetes
